REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2135 reute d f BC-STERLING-DRUG-<STY>-S 03-31 0053

TEXT.TITLE: STERLING DRUG <STY> SELLS ASSETS OF SUBSIDIARY
TEXT.BODY: Sterling Drug Inc said it sold the assets of its subsidiary Greene Dental Products Inc to Rinn Corp, of Elgin, Ill. The cash purchase price was not disclosed. Greene produces and sells dental X-ray tabs, mount products and record systems. Reuter
